overview: Genesis - Columbus, Ohio 10 October, 1978 (55:20) - Includes long clips (usually the full 3 minute reel) of 11th Earl of Mar - In the Cage - Burning Rope - Ripples - Deep in the Motherlode - One for the Vine - Squonk - Say It's Alright Joe - The Lady Lies - Cinema Show - Afterglow - Follow You Follow Me - Dance on a Volcano - Drum Duet - Los Endos - I Know What I Like  genesismuseum.com
title: Genesis - Live in Columbus 1978
